CustomField.formula:
If (Disruptions_Last_6_Months__c >= 1 && Disruptions_Last_6_Months__c <= 3, 80, 0) +
If (Disruptions_Last_6_Months__c > 3, 120, 0) +
Days_Since_Created__c +
Keywords__c +
Loyalty_Tier_New__c +
IF(Contact.Sensitive__c = TRUE, 100, 0) +
Travel_Date__c
CustomField.label: Case Priority Matrix
